LanguageData.FishPopulationDesc: How many fish are in this body of water. Larger bodies of water have more fish and will recover fish populations faster.
LanguageData.MinimumPopulationDesc: Colonists won't fish if the fish population is under this limit. Fishing yields are lower if there are less than 300 fish.
LanguageData.ToggleFishAvoid: When toggled off, colonists will avoid catching this fish.
